readme:
# OpenJML ESC
This packages provides [OpenJML](http://www.openjml.org/)'s ESC tool to Atom.  

In order to use this package you need to install OpenJML and a supported version of [Z3](https://github.com/Z3Prover/z3).  
After installing OpenJML and Z3 make sure to set the correct paths in the settings of this package.  
If one of the paths contains whitespaces, make sure to enclose the path with `"` characters!  
AFTER DOING CHANGES TO THE SETTINGS YOU NEED TO RESTART ATOM!  
Instead of restarting you can reload Atom, too. (Default: ctrl-shift-F5)  

Check the keybindings in the package settings to run OpenJML ESC!  
Alternatively you can run the following commands with the Atom command palette (Default: ctrl-shift-p):  
+ `openjml-esc:toggle` toggles the visibility of the OpenJML ESC panel.  
+ `openjml-esc:run` saves the currently opened file and runs OpenJML ESC.
